Package info.oais.infomodel.implementation.representationinformation

package info.oais.infomodel.implementation.representationinformation
This module provides a number of classes which are used in the OAIS-IF Reference Implementation of Representation Information. The classes implement the OAIS abstract interfaces in simple ways using additional concepts beyond the OAIS Information Model.

The classes are used in the Representation Information implementations beyond the OAIS immediate specifications.

Version:
1.0
Author:
David Giaretta
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    info.oais.infomodel.implementation
    This module provides implementations of the classes defined in OAIS with minimum additions for the OAIS-IF Reference Implementation.

    This module provides a number of classes which are used in the OAIS-IF Reference Implementation of PDI, adding concepts beyond the OAIS Information Model.
    info.oais.infomodel.implementation.utility
    This module provides a number of utility classes which are used in the OAIS-IF Reference Implementation.
